the §6Structure Tower§r is used in the §eRocket Assembly multiblock§r. It is placed on one of the sides from the §elaunch pad's side to the desired height§r. The height depends on §ehow high your Rocket is§r.
I recommend making it §eone block higher for safety precaution§r. It must be §econnected to the Launch Pads§r.

To craft them, you'll need seven §6Steel Rod§rs.
